snippet: From its beginnings in Ann Arbor, Mich., a deli has grown into a circle of businesses, all celebrating employee involvement.
abstract: Zingerman's in Ann Arbor, Mich, has grown from a deli into circle of nine businesses, all celebrating employee involvement; they include a restaurant, coffee company, original deli and bakery; annual deli revenue reached $14 million in 2013, less than 30 percent of total company revenue.
lead_paragraph: From its beginnings in Ann Arbor, Mich., a deli has grown into a circle of businesses, all celebrating employee involvement.

headline.main: At Zingerman’s, Pastrami and Partnership to Go
